full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 747 Filed 08/10/22 Page 227 of 228 903 LC2Qmax7 - corrected Alessi - Direct logistics to get him to where he's staying. THE COURT: I usually just make sure everybody is on the same page, and we are. Thank you. Everyone may be seated. (Witness not present) THE COURT: Are there matters to take up? MR. PAGLIUCA: Not from the defense, your Honor. MS. COMEY: None from the government, your Honor. THE COURT: So we will meet at 8:45. Please confer on any anticipated issues so that we can address them before we have the jury. And I'll see you in the morning. Thank you. (Adjourned to December 3, 2021 at 8:45 a.m.) SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012512

MR. PAGLIUCA: Not from the defense, your Honor.
MS. COMEY: None from the government, your Honor.
THE COURT: So we will meet at 8:45. Please confer on any anticipated issues so that we can address them before we have the jury. And I'll see you in the morning. Thank you.
